Title: Flint
Writer: Josh Sanburn (based upon an article by), Barbara Stepansky
Actors: Marin Ireland, Betsy Brandt, Queen Latifah, Richard Waugh
Plot: A woman deals with the toxic water scandal in Flint, Michigan, and the effect it has on her family.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 4 wins & 24 nominations.
